org.pac4j.core.io

Class SpringResourceWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.io.SpringResourceWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpringWritableResourceWrapper

    public class SpringResourceWrapper
extends Object
implements Resource
    A wrapper that adapts a spring Resource to a pac4j Resource.
    Since:
    1.9.0
    Author:
    Keith Garry Boyce

      • getInputStream

        public InputStream getInputStream()
                           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Resource
        Return an InputStream. Caller is responsible for closing the stream
        Specified by:
        getInputStream in interface Resource
        Returns:
        the input stream for the underlying resource (must not be null)
        Throws:
        IOException - if the stream could not be opened

      • exists

        public boolean exists()
        Description copied from interface: Resource
        Return whether this resource actually exists in physical form.

        This method performs a definitive existence check, whereas the existence of a Resource handle only guarantees a valid descriptor handle.

        Specified by:
        exists in interface Resource
        Returns:
        whether this resource actually exists in physical form

      • getFilename

        public String getFilename()
        Description copied from interface: Resource
        Determine a filename for this resource, i.e. typically the last part of the path: for example, "myfile.txt".

        Returns null if this type of resource does not have a filename.

        Specified by:
        getFilename in interface Resource
        Returns:
        a filename for this resource, i.e. typically the last
